app.name: matrix-authentication-service
app.technical_description: OpenID Connect 发现文档： %(discovery_url)s

add_email.description: 输入电子邮件地址，以便在失去访问权限时恢复账户。
add_email.heading: 添加电子邮件地址

captcha.noscript: This form is protected by a CAPTCHA and requires JavaScript to be enabled to submit it. Please enable JavaScript in your browser and reload this page.

change_password.description: 这将更改您账户的密码。
change_password.heading: 更改我的密码

consent.client_wants_access: %(client_name)s at %(redirect_uri)s wants to acccess your account.
consent.heading: Allow access to your account?
consent.you_may_be_sharing: You may be sharing sensitive information with this site or app.

device_code_link.headline: Enter the code displayed on your device

device_consent.another_device_access: Another device wants to access your account.

denied.description: You denied access to %(client_name)s. You can close this window.
denied.heading: Access denied

granted.description: You granted access to %(client_name)s. You can close this window.
granted.heading: Access granted

recovery.click_button: Click on the button below to create a new password:
recovery.copy_link: Copy the following link and paste it into a browser to create a new password:
recovery.headline: You requested a password reset for your %(server_name)s account.
recovery.subject: Reset your account password (%(mxid)s)
recovery.you_can_ignore: If you didn't ask for a new password, you can ignore this email. Your current password will continue to work.

verify.body_html: 确认此电子邮件地址的验证码是： %(code)s
verify.body_text: 确认此电子邮件地址的验证码是： %(code)s
verify.subject: 您的邮箱验证码是：%(code)s

errors.captcha: CAPTCHA verification failed, please try again
errors.rate_limit_exceeded: You've made too many requests in a short period. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

link.description: 关联您的 %(provider)s 账户
link.headline: 登录以链接

not_found.description: 您要查找的页面不存在或已被移动
not_found.heading: 页面未找到

policy_violation.description: 这可能是由于创建请求的客户端、当前登录的用户或请求本身造成的。
policy_violation.heading: 授权请求被该服务执行的策略拒绝

consumed.description: To create a new password, start over and select “Forgot password”.
consumed.heading: The link to reset your password has already been used

disabled.description: If you have lost your credentials, please contact the administrator to recover your account.
disabled.heading: Account recovery is disabled

expired.description: Request a new email that will be sent to: %(email)s.
expired.heading: The link to reset your password has expired

finish.description: Choose a new password for your account.
finish.heading: Reset your password

progress.description: We sent an email with a link to reset your password if there's an account using %(email)s.
progress.heading: Check your email

start.description: An email will be sent with a link to reset your password.
start.heading: Enter your email to continue

create_account.description: 请创建一个账户以开始使用：
create_account.heading: 创建账户

register.terms_of_service: 我同意条款与条件

scope.edit_profile: 编辑个人资料和联系方式
scope.mas_admin: 管理 matrix-authentication-service 上的用户
scope.view_profile: 查看个人资料信息和联系方式

link_mismatch.heading: 此上游账户已与另一个账户关联。

register.enforced_by_policy: 由服务器策略强制执行
register.forced_email: 将使用以下电子邮件地址

import_data.description: 确认将链接到新%(server_name)s 账户的信息。
import_data.heading: 导入数据

verify_email.description: 输入发送至以下邮箱的6位数代码：%(email)s
verify_email.headline: 验证邮箱
